name: Space Infector
description:
You are earth's last hope! Only you can stop the invading bacterium.

I'm sorry.

Controls

Left/Right arrows/DPAD move

Space/A button shoots

little touch buttons do the same stuff for mobile, yay!

I do the live gamedev things sometimes on the Twitches

This game was made in under 3 hours for Trijam 96

  • GFX/Code/Gameplay/some SFX by Lopar
  • Music by Ruinerr
  • Pew-pew sounds by vUVu
  • Font used is Jamma from the Pixel Font Pack
